request.description: Updates a Person by passing in a JSON, XML or YML, looking by its ID
Adds a new Person by passing in a JSON, XML or YML representation of the person
Deletes a Person by passing in a JSON, XML or YML, looking by its ID
Updates a Book by passing in a JSON, XML or YML, looking by its ID
Adds a new book by passing in a JSON, XML or YML representation of the book
Deletes a book by passing in a JSON, XML or YML, looking by its ID
